publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4791 Mr Brian Monteith: Forth Estuary Hovercraft—That the Parliament congratulates the Stagecoach Group for its innovative bid to slash journey times across the Forth, from Kirkcaldy to Portobello, with plans to trial a hovercraft service for a three-week period and encourages commuters to give the service every consideration in order that it may be fully tested and, if successful, retained as a viable alternative to road and rail travel.

S2M-4791 Mr Brian Monteith: Forth Estuary Hovercraft—That the Parliament congratulates the Stagecoach Group for its innovative bid to slash journey times across the Forth, from Kirkcaldy to Portobello, with plans to trial a hovercraft service for a three-week period and encourages commuters to give the service every consideration in order that it may be fully tested and, if successful, retained as a viable alternative to road and rail travel.
S2M-4791 Forth Estuary Hovercraft (lodged on 12 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4791 Forth Estuary Hovercraft (lodged on 12 September 2006) Chris Ballance*, Fergus Ewing*, Scott Barrie*
S2M-4791 Forth Estuary Hovercraft (lodged on 12 September 2006) Bruce Crawford*, John Swinburne*, Shiona Baird*

S2M-4791 Forth Estuary Hovercraft (lodged on 12 September 2006) Brian Adam*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Robin Harper*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Mike Pringle*, Jim Mather*, Mr Andrew Arbuckle*, Eleanor Scott*, Trish Godman*
S2M-4791 Forth Estuary Hovercraft (lodged on 12 September 2006) Fiona Hyslop*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Mark Ruskell* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
